casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Tad William DEXTER. No. 577P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 7, 2007. Chris Sinha, Assistant Attorney General, Scott Thomas, District Attorney, for State of NC.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 651 S.E.2d 900.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of December 2007 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 7th day of December 2007."
